name: Slimelands (Jme)
description:
Instructions

Arrow keys or WASD to move |:| Space, z, f, or left click to throw a slimeball |:| Enter, x, g, or right click to use your special ability |:| Shift, h, or c to dash

Lore

You currently live in a romote land, far away from people. It is here that magic grows. You are an apprentice mage, who also dabbles in alchemy. You were sent here to learn your first lesson: the ways of the slime. You were getting along with the slime, them helping you by making certain slime magical ingredients, and you making them potions that help them survive in this cruel world. One night you hear a sound in the dark. You get up and look around, then you see a strange maze, with a purple light emanating from the center. You hear sloshing and squishing, so you wonder why slimes are up this late at night. You explore and find a dark box with a skull on it, oozing purple goo and suddenly the purple goo infests a some mud and grass, morphing into  what seems to be a slime. The only difference is the eyes. Those purple eyes. The evilness seeping from them...
